docs.abstract: Dr Van Itallie, other nutrition experts score overeating in US, ss, NYC
docs.lead_paragraph: A dietary revolution has reduced the ill-fed in America from one-third to less than onetenth of the population, food experts said yesterday. In fact, others said, a major nutritional difficulty today is over-nutrition.
docs.snippet: A dietary revolution has reduced the ill-fed in America from one-third to less than onetenth of the population, food experts said yesterday. In fact, others said, a major nutritional difficulty today is over-nutrition.
